_sText:
Been Working on this for the last week or so
thanks to TopHATTwaffle for his beautifull textures
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/2573

-UPDATE--FINAL- 
*fixed the shadow controller so its using correct angles.
*added some crates in the middle alley to provide cover.
*named the nav mesh so it will now tell you where you  are and bots yell enemy locations.
*added a couple vents to the roof to add some height variation.
no more updates from now on the map is done, its stable and im happy with it.

-UPDATE- quickfix i left a spawn in an area I was testing silly me.

-UPDATE- 21_4_10 *ugg will this never end :S
*optimized the map futher im now getting a minimum of 90-100 fps and averaging about 200-300
*added some benches around and some random vine things
*placed some decals around the map randomly
*added a couple more props inside
*tweaked some of the buildings in the 3d skybox
*added a shadow controll

-UPDATE- 20_4_10
*swaped more cliffs out for models
*fixed the foor in the foyer it had 3 cubemaps linked to it(could be the issue)
*removed most of the props in the offices to reduse entdata(was at 140% could also be issue)
*changed the cliffs in 3dskybox for the coast model that comes with halflife (less polys)
the only other thing i can think of is changeing the skybox to a hdr version. Currently its running HDR lighting with a normal skybox. Ive never known this to cause a crash though.

-UPDATE- 19_4_10
*converted some of the complex brushwork into models
like the distant mountains and wooden roofs.
*changed a couple areas
*removed the env_sun (was being overridden by the HDR)
*changed the lighting in a couple of the rooms to make it brighter
*clipped the area that Gecko managed to get onto.
If anyone is experiencing crashes post your specs mainly your card. The map work perfectly on my rig
running 32bit vista with a nividia GTX 285

---One of the fixes for the people that crash seems to be turning off the HDR---

-64 players max 32 per side (duh)
-Large 3d skybox
-Nav mesh
-Overview
-Compiled with HDR

If you find any errors please let me know been testing for the last few days but i could have overlooked something.
